metadata.description: Custom plugins and marketplace for Claude Code skills

plugins.name: product-manager
plugins.description: Product Manager skill for creating well-structured GitHub issues from feature requests and bug reports

plugins.name: agent-knowledge
plugins.description: Agent Knowledge Base - Captures and organizes learnings from external AI agents into a structured knowledge base

plugins.name: bug-hunter
plugins.description: Random bug hunter that selects files weighted by recency, analyzes with context for bugs, and creates GitHub issues

plugins.name: bug-fixer
plugins.description: TDD-based bug fixer that reads GitHub issues, implements fixes, and creates PRs with severity-based batching

plugins.name: create-pr
plugins.description: Post-task PR creation with git context analysis, auto-commit, and issue linking
